content: I was observing the movement pattern of a ground beetle and noticed some other patterns never seen before... I presume your friend must be visiting?
info: 日常对话-功能NPC-主机联机闲聊-7墨尔斯_联机对话（CB1）

content: If possible, please allow me to observe the morphological traits of your friend, this is... Ahem, {A抱歉}I meant, I wish you a wonderful time together.
